artist: Author: Amber Gayle; Designer: Stacy Wakefield; Printer: Knust Press, Nijmegen, Netherlands; Publisher: Evil Twin Publications, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume, photomechanical reproduction of a photograph of a bridge, printed in color offset lithography on the wove paper front covers, and printed again but slightly offset on a transparent film wrapped around the covers; 70 pp.
medium: Color offset lithography, letterpress, stamp, and screenprint; bound volume
title: Transient Songs
